projects.name: PersonTracker
projects.info: A pure Python implementation that integrates AI models and libraries for person tracking using CCTV footage or videos. This system connects face recognition, gait analysis (GaitGL), and object detection (YOLOv8n) into a unified workflowâ€”no UI or full application, just the core logic and model integration code.

projects.name: Mongolian RLPR system
projects.info: YOLOv8-Based Mongolian License Plate Detection A computer vision project built from scratch using YOLOv8 to detect Mongolian license plates. Trained on the mlub-mongolian-car-plate-prediction dataset.
